Description: Rim fragment of South Ionian Fikellura pottery amphora; inside, glazed with broad reserved band, and reserved at break; top of lip glazed; outside, lip decorated with frieze of diagonal lines in black; banding below.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 127, no. Nau 91, pl. 21, fig. b)
CVA Heidelberg I / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Heidelberg Universität Band I (p. 11, no. 21, pl. 21, no. 21)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GF.069)
